attributes.action: Give asylum to Ukraine asylum seekers during Russia invasion
attributes.additional_details: This will give ukrainian refugees option to join their families in safe country
attributes.background: There is a large number of ukrainians living in UK and if UK government would allow ukrainians with no visa but with relatives in UK to ask for asylum - they might join their relatives here in UK and start a new safe life.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
